title: Mannile Mannile Song Lyrics Mazhai
stanzas: <div>Mannile Mannile Song Lyrics Mazhai

Mannile mannile
vandhu udaiyudhu vaanam
mazhaiyile karaiyuthe
rendu manangalin thooram

kadhil kaetkum idi oasai
kadhal nenin pari baasha
mazhaiyai pola uravaadu
manadhil enna peraasai

neeril ezhudhum
kadhal azhiyum
malai neere ezhudhidum
kadhal azhiyaathe

I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu
I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu
Mannile Mannile

Poo sidharidum megam
pon vaanavil varaigiratho
yen nirangalinaal namakoru
maalai seigiratho..

vaan thaaragai ellaam
neer pookkalin thoranamo
vaan dhevathaigal
aasigal koorum atchathaiyo..

iththnai mazhaiyilum
indha naanam karaiyavillai
kanni naan nanaiyalaam
karpu nanaivathillai

adi manithanai vidavum
mazhaithuli peridhu
idhuvarai puriyavillai.

I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu
I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu

naan kadhalai solla
en vaaimozhi thunaiyillaiye
than vaarthaigalaal
mazhaithuli en manam solliyathe

mun koapura azhagai
un thaavani moodiyathe
un ragasiyathi mazhaithuli
ambalam aakkiyathe

mazhai vilum pozhuthellaam
ennai vandhu servaayaa?
kadhalai serppathe mazhaiyin
velaiyaa ?

aada malargalil mazhai vilum
vergalil veyil vilum
adhisayam arivaayaa ?

I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu
I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu

Mannile mannile
vandhu udaiyudhu vaanam
mazhaiyile karaiyuthe
rendu manangalin thooram

kadhil kaetkum idi oasai
kadhal nenin pari baasha
mazhaiyai pola uravaadu
manadhil enna peraasai

neeril ezhudhum
kadhal azhiyum
malai neere ezhudhidum
kadhal azhiyaathe

I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu
I love you Shailajaa Shailajaa
oh shailu shailu
